data.value: Enter an item number or a barcode

data.name: ErroreCodiceFiscaleNonValido
data.value: The field "{0}" does not contain a valid fiscal code.

data.value: Commercial terms related to the customer contain invalid data.

data.name: ErroreConnessioneServer
data.value:
There was an error connecting to the server.
Make sure you have an active internet connection or try again later.

data.name: ErroreDataNonValida
data.value: The field "{0}" must be a valid date in the format "dd/mm/yyyy"

data.name: ErroreDateConsegna
data.value: There are no valid delivery dates for the current settings of the order.

data.name: ErroreDateConsegnaDettaglio
data.value: There are no valid delivery dates for the order type "{0}" season "{1}" and the line "{2}" for the date "{3: d}" .

data.name: ErroreDateConsegnaTestata
data.value: There are no valid delivery dates for the order type "{0}" for date "{2: d}" .

data.name: ErroreDimensioneLogo
data.value: Size of the logo too big

data.value: The field "{0}" does not contain a valid e-mail address

data.name: ErroreIndirizziCliente
data.value: You must enter at least one address

data.name: ErroreLicenze
data.value: You have reached the maximum number of licenses, to insert a new agent contact Software Assistance

data.name: ErroreListinoArticolo
data.value: The item "{0}" has no associated price list.

data.name: ErroreListinoNonTrovato
data.value: Missing price in the price list.

data.value: Can not find a price list based on the current settings of the order.

data.name: ErroreListinoVarianti
data.value: Error: only one price list must contain the prices of all variants of the same article

data.name: ErroreLoginClienteBloccato
data.value: Authorization not recognized, contact the sales office.

data.name: ErroreLoginSospensione

data.name: ErroreModificaOrdineNonTemporaneo
